This is an [R Markdown website](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/rmarkdown_websites.html), created by Javier De Vicente and Antonio Elías. It was forked from the project of [Jeff Golsmith Github](https://github.com/jeff-goldsmith/IWAFDA).
